grimace.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to twist your face in an ugly way because you do not like something, because you are feeling pain, or because you are trying to be funny
grimace.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She sipped the whisky and grimaced.
She grimaced at her reflection in the mirror.
grimace.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an expression you make by twisting your face because you do not like something or because you are feeling pain
grimace.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: His face twisted in a grimace of pain.
